accessibility_support_other: This training can be customized according to your accessibility needs. Some adjustments may induce additional costs as they are provided by third-party providers.
comments: On-site teaching sessions can be scheduled upon request.
description: This training course provides the keys to create accessible content with an online editor (such as WordPress). It gives essential basics and practical methodologies to produce and publish accessible web content with the needs of people with disabilities in mind.
length: 1 day (7 hours), may be 2 days (14 hours), if the training is organized within one company.
prerequisites: Participants should already have published content on the web such as texts and images.
